Kim Hyun Ji

Introduction

To-Ya, also spelled as To-ya, was a three-member girl group under Victor Entertainment and Norman Entertainment (formerly A-stars Entertainment). Formed in 1999, they debuted on November 1, 2000 in Japan with the single "Are You...?" and on July 14, 2001 in Korea with the album Look. During preparations for their second album, they disbanded in early 2003 due to problems with the agency. The group reunited in April 2016 for the JTBC music program Two Yoo Project Sugar Man.
